table.name: vtiger_bhsorderprocessing
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_bhsorderprocessing` ( `bhsorderprocessingid` int(19) NOT NULL, `bhsorderprocessing_name` varchar(50) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`bhsorderprocessingid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_bhsorderprocessingcf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_bhsorderprocessingcf` ( `bhsorderprocessingid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`bhsorderprocessingid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
